entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Port Colborne
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low plus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness late this evening then 30 percent chance of rain showers or flurries overnight. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 6:46 PM EDT Monday 20 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Cloudy. High 8.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud late in the afternoon. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High 8. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 6:46 PM EDT Monday 20 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low zero.
